bitmap.name: bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap to show with the item (default: none).

bitmap.name: bitmap2
bitmap.label: Checked bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap for the checked state (wxMSW, if checkable; default: none).

value.name: wxITEM_RADIO
value.description: A checkable menu item which makes part of a radio group of menu items each of which is automatically unchecked whenever another menu item in the group is checked.

value.name: wxITEM_CHECK
value.description: A checkable menu item (such menu item stays pressed after it had been toggled)

text.name: help
text.description: Help shown in statusbar when the item is selected (default: none).

event.name: EVT_MENU
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_SELECTED command, which is generated by a menu item.

event.name: EVT_MENU_RANGE
event.description: Process a wxEVT_COMMAND_MENU_RANGE command, which is generated by a range of menu items.

event.name: EVT_MENU_OPEN
event.description: A menu is about to be opened. On Windows, this is only sent once for each navigation of the menubar (up until all menus have closed).

event.name: EVT_MENU_CLOSE
event.description: A menu has been just closed.

event.name: EVT_MENU_HIGHLIGHT
event.description: The menu item with the specified id has been highlighted: used to show help prompts in the status bar by wxFrame.

event.name: EVT_MENU_HIGHLIGHT_ALL
event.description: A menu item has been highlighted, i.e. the currently selected menu item has changed.
